msg: Access denied. One of the following scopes is required: [bitable:app:readonly, bitable:app, base:record:retrieve].应用尚未开通所需的应用身份权限：[bitable:app:readonly, bitable:app, base:record:retrieve]，点击链接申请并开通任一权限即可：https://open.feishu.cn/app/cli_a827debc897f101c/auth?q=bitable:app:readonly,bitable:app,base:record:retrieve&op_from=openapi&token_type=tenant

error.message: Refer to the documentation to fix the error: https://open.feishu.cn/document/uAjLw4CM/ugTN1YjL4UTN24CO1UjN/trouble-shooting/how-to-fix-the-99991672-error
